name: Lattice Checkers
description:
Spatial checkers is a new exciting intellectual game in 3D lattice.

Rules are similar to known ordinary  2D checkers game but there are some differences.
The goal of game is to move your checkers-balls to the opposite (rival's) side of lattice.
Making a move, the player moves one of his checkers to an adjacent free node in direction of rival's side.
 If the adjacent node has an opponent's checker, and the next further is free, the player is obliged to "take" the checker, moving own checker to that free node, opponent's checker will be removed from lattice. 
A player can "take" a several opponent's checkers during one move.
If a checker has reached the opposite side of the lattice, it turns into a “queen”, and player returns one from earlier eaten by the rival checkers to any free node of his side of the lattice,- and an additional move is given.
"Queens" moves like ordinary checker, when they has taken an opponent's checker turned up behind.

The game ends when one of players loses all checkers or players has no opportunity to make a move. 
The winner is the one with more checkers on the rival's side.
In new version of program your can play with rival via network, locally at the single computer, or with one of three levels of artificial intelligence.
You can choose the size of the lattice, the color of the checkers and first move . 
You can rewind the game and continue from any move,  save the current game and load it later..
Play and develop your 3D thinking abilities!
